introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is AIPHOTOSHOP?
introduce.label: Platform Introduction
introduce.description: AIPHOTOSHOP.uk is an AI-powered photo generation platform. Users only need to enter a description to generate high-quality AI photos with one click. Supports multiple styles, sizes, and creative options to meet all your AI art needs.

items.title: AI Smart Generation
items.description: Enter a description, and AI will automatically generate high-quality photos, simple and efficient.

items.title: Multi-style Support
items.description: Supports art, realistic, anime and other styles to meet different creative needs.

items.title: Pay to Use
items.description: Flexible plans, unlimited use of AI art features after payment.

items.title: High Quality Output

items.title: Fast Generation

items.title: Secure Payment

items.title: What is AIPHOTOSHOP?

items.title: How do I pay and use?

items.title: What styles are supported?

items.title: Can I use generated photos commercially?
